definitions.title: m.
definitions.body: only Ho 10:1, perh. infl. of [[יִשְׂרָאֵל]] 2Ki 4:39) vine (NH id., Ar. jafnun (Yemen), As. gapnu, cf. Zehnpfund:BAS i. 633; Aram. [[גּוֹפַן]], [[גֶּפֶן]], gpeto0, pl. guwpene0)—´[[ג]] Ge 40:9 + 38 t. (also cstr., as Nu 6:4, De 32:32, Is 16:8, Is 16:9), [[גׇּ֑פֶן]] Ju Jdg 9:12 + 2 t.; sf. [[גַּפְנִי]] Joe 1:7, [[גַּפְנְךָ]] Je 5:17, [[גַּפְנוֹ]] 1Ki 5:5 = 3 t., [[גַּפְנׇהּ]] Ho 2:14, [[גַּפְנׇם]] De 32:32 + 2 t.; pl. [[גְּפָנִים]] Ct So 2:13, Hb Hab 3:17—vine (always grape-bearing exc. 2Ki 4:39) Ge 40:9, Ge 40:10 (in dream) Ge 49:11, Nu 20:5, De 8:8, Ju Jdg 9:12, Jdg 9:13 (in allegory) 1Ki 5:5, 2Ki 18:31 = Is 36:16, Ps 78:47, Ps 105:33, Ct So 2:13, So 6:11, So 7:13, Is 7:23, Is 24:7, Is 32:12, Je 5:17, Je 8:13, Ho 2:14, Joe 1:7, Joe 1:12, Joe 2:22, Mic 4:4, Hb Hab 3:17, Hag 2:19, Zec 2:10, Zec 8:12, Mal 3:11; [[גֶּפֶן שָׂדֶה]] a vine bearing poisonous gourds 2Ki 4:39; [[גֶּפֶן הַיַּיִן]] Nu 6:4 (cf. Ge 40:10, Ju Jdg 9:13) Ju Jdg 13:14; [[אֶשְׁכְּלוֹת הַגֶּפֶן]] Ct So 8:9; [[עֵץ הַגֶּפֶן]] Ez Eze 15:2, Eze 15:6; in simile of stars fading away at Yahweh's judgment Is 34:4; in simile of wicked losing early promise Job 15:33; in simile of wife Ps 128:3; fig. of Israel Ps 80:9, Ps 80:15, Ez Eze 17:6, Eze 17:6, Eze 17:7, Eze 17:8, Ho 10:1 cf. Ez Eze 19:10, Je 2:21, Je 6:9; also Ho 14:8; fig. of Israel as easily destroyed Ez Eze 15:2, Eze 15:6; fig. of godless enemies of Israel De 32:32 cf. Di; [[גֶּפֶן שִׂבְמָה]] fig. for prosperity of Moab Is 16:8, Is 16:9, Je 48:32.—On the vine in Syria cf. Anderlind:ZPV 1888, 160 ff.
